Zygarde (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0717: Yveltal
Pokémon
#0719: Diancie →

Zygarde has been featured on 15 different cards since it debuted in the Fates Collide expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Zygarde cards are normally Fighting-type or Dragon-type Basic Pokémon. As a Dragon-type, their attacks normally have costs including and Energy.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Zygarde

Zygarde
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
